alert.note: Alert for Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:47PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern West Feliciana, Pointe Coupee and northwestern Iberville Parishes through 430 PM CDT... At 347 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Morganza to near Lottie to near Butte La Rose to 10 miles northeast of Charenton. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Roads, Livonia, Maringouin, Fordoche, Morganza, Lettsworth, Batchelor and Lottie. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 128 and 133. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
